html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-08392022-06-25,  ,  ,  GAC, 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Belarus) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (BELARUS) in order to (1) add thirteen (13) individuals and two (2) entities to Schedule 1, Part 1 of the Regulations; (2) move Schedule 3 of the Regulations to Annex 1 of the Restricted Goods and Technologies List; (3) impose a ban on exports to Belarus of luxury goods, which are listed in a new Schedule 3, Part 1; (4) impose a ban on the imports from Belarus of luxury goods, which are listed in a new Schedule 3, Part 2; (5) impose a ban on the export to Belarus of goods that could be used in the production and manufacturing of weapons by Belarus, which are listed in a new Schedule 4; and (6) ban the export to Belarus of advanced goods and technologies that could be used in the production and manufacturing of weapons by Belarus, which are listed in a new Schedule 5.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0167 Publication Date: 2022-07-06
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Belarus) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (BELARUS) in order to (1) add thirteen (13) individuals and two (2) entities to Schedule 1, Part 1 of the Regulations; (2) move Schedule 3 of the Regulations to Annex 1 of the Restricted Goods and Technologies List; (3) impose a ban on exports to Belarus of luxury goods, which are listed in a new Schedule 3, Part 1; (4) impose a ban on the imports from Belarus of luxury goods, which are listed in a new Schedule 3, Part 2; (5) impose a ban on the export to Belarus of goods that could be used in the production and manufacturing of weapons by Belarus, which are listed in a new Schedule 4; and (6) ban the export to Belarus of advanced goods and technologies that could be used in the production and manufacturing of weapons by Belarus, which are listed in a new Schedule 5.
